titleStmt.title: The character of a good commander together with a short commendation of the famous Artillery (more properly military) Company of London : also a brief encomium on the great duke and worthy prince, Elector of Brandenbourg : lastly plain dealing with treacherous dealers : whereunto [sic] is annexed the general exercise of the Prince of Orange's army / by Captain Tho. Plunket.
titleStmt.author: Plunket, Thomas, b. 1625.

titleStmt.title: The character of a good commander together with a short commendation of the famous Artillery (more properly military) Company of London : also a brief encomium on the great duke and worthy prince, Elector of Brandenbourg : lastly plain dealing with treacherous dealers : whereunto [sic] is annexed the general exercise of the Prince of Orange's army / by Captain Tho. Plunket.
titleStmt.author: Plunket, Thomas, b. 1625.

notesStmt.note: "The magnanimity and gallantry of that illustrious prince the Elector of Brandenburg" (p. [31]-46) has special t.p. "The general exercise ordered by His Highness the Prince of Orange, to be punctually observed of all the infantry" has separate paging and special t.p.
Most of the text is in verse.
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
